neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

a hundred flowers bloom (idiom); let the arts have free expression
a hundred flowers bloom, a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC, but adopted for Mao's campaign of 1956
pinyin: bai3 hua1 qi2 fang4 , bai3 jia1 zheng1 ming2

sentences.english: In this aspect, the dissemination study present is all flowers blooms together, has not decided one.
sentences.chinese: 在这方面，传播学现在是百花齐放，没有定于一尊。

sentences.english: Last year, Star Wars: The Phantom Menace was big. This year it's more mixed.
sentences.chinese: 去年是《星战前传》的热潮，今年则是百花齐放。
花儿，百花齐放，香飘四野。

sentences.english: It's a highly creative period, and now is the time for ideas.
sentences.chinese: 现在正是百家争鸣，百花齐放的时期。

sentences.english: A single flower does not do a spring.
sentences.chinese: 一花独放否则春，百花齐放春满园。

sentences.english: The world is very much like a garden, whose most beautiful season comes when all kinds of flowers blossom.
sentences.chinese: 世界如同一个大花园，百花齐放，才能更美丽。

sentences.english: Our educational work is like a hundred flowers in bloom, like ten thousnd horses galloping ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我们的教育事业，正如百花齐放，万马奔腾。

sentences.english: Contend is a slogan guiding China's literature.
sentences.chinese: “百花齐放，百家争鸣”是指导中国文学的一条语录。
花儿，百花齐放，喷鼻飘四野。

sentences.english: Our country's literature and arts scenes are blossoming freely.
sentences.chinese: 我们国家的文艺事业百花齐放。

sentences.english: The streets are more beautiful with all the lights on .
sentences.chinese: 华灯齐放，大街更漂亮了。

sentences.english: Letting a hundred flowers bloom, meritocratic purpose of the event is more capable personnel.
sentences.chinese: 百花齐放，用人唯贤才是晚会的宗旨。

sentences.english: Modern Russian literature Flourishes in all kinds of fields.
sentences.chinese: 当代俄罗斯文学呈现百花齐放的姿态。
